solution_line_template: Albert has to run {total_laps_needed} laps in total because {total_distance_to_run} / {track_length_per_lap} = <<{total_distance_to_run}/{track_length_per_lap}={total_laps_needed}>>{total_laps_needed}
He has {remaining_laps} more complete laps to run because {total_laps_needed} - {laps_already_run} = <<{total_laps_needed}-{laps_already_run}={remaining_laps}>>{remaining_laps}
